    }

    "printFormType": "I"
  },
  "taxOptions": {
    "stateCalculationPrecedence": "No",
    "isDeductionShortfallsMadeUp": false,
    "isLocalTaxesComputedFirst": true,
    "isReturnQueueOnHold": false,
    "isExternalTaxAgencyUsed": false,
    "nameToUseOnReturn": "Primary",

  },
  "excludeReportsOrChecks": "None",

  "isDbdtFlatFeeProrated": true,
  "checkTimeOffAvailability": "Yes",
  "miscellaneousDefaults": {
    "payFrequency": {
      "hourlyEmployees": "Weekly",
      "salariedEmployees": "Weekly"
    },
    "withholding": "Single",
    "isLimitTo1099Applied": true,
    "distributions": "DistributeBoth",
    "isBenefitsEligible": false,
    "isEmployeeVoucherPrinted": true,
    "employeeAutoReduction": "Both"
  },
  "isCobraAdminFeeCharged": false,
  "creditHold": "None",
  "isTimeOffAccrualWithEvolution": false,
  "isSmokingFactoredInBenefitRates": false,
  "contact": {
    "name": "Cheri",
    "designation": null,
    "email": "rest@test.com",
    "phones": [
      {
        "number": "802-825-6516",
        "description": null
      }
    ]
  }
}

item.name: Employee
item.description: Provides access to information regarding the employment of a person by a company.
